name: Zynex, Inc.
description: Zynex, Inc. is a medical technology company dedicated to providing innovative medical devices that enhance the quality of life for patients with chronic pain and neurological disorders. Founded in 1996 by Thomas Sandgaard, Zynex specializes in the development and manufacturing of electrotherapy devices, particularly its flagship product, the NexWave, which is designed to provide effective pain relief through electrical stimulation. The company also offers a range of other products, including the Zynex NeuroDiagnostic System, which aids in the diagnosis of neurological conditions. Zynex is committed to advancing its technology and expanding its product offerings to meet the needs of patients and healthcare providers. With a focus on research and development, Zynex aims to improve patient outcomes and provide cost-effective solutions in the healthcare sector. The company operates in a growing market, addressing the increasing demand for non-invasive pain management and rehabilitation solutions. Zynex's mission is to empower individuals to regain their independence and enhance their overall well-being through innovative medical technology.
